<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AgileDebugUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>AgileDebugUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AgileDebugUtil = Class.create();
AgileDebugUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    type: 'AgileDebugUtil'
};

AgileDebugUtil.logMsg = function(message) {
    var debugValue = gs.getProperty("com.snc.agile.debug", "false");
    if((debugValue && debugValue === "true") || GlideSessionDebug.isDebugging("log")){
        gs.info(message);
    }
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-05-09 23:00:16</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1854e80b9f223200598a5bb0657fcfc5</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AgileDebugUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Agile Development 2.0" source="com.snc.sdlc.agile.2.0">c2159f242fc10110d8a4d5f62799b627</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1854e80b9f223200598a5bb0657fcfc5</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>

</record_update>
